description: Hoji`s Mightyena was first seen when Go`s Taillow jumped on its head and Go mistakenly attempted to capture it, thinking it was a wild Pok√©mon. It got aggravated when Go`s Scorbunny plucked a handful of fur from it. It battled in the Battle Frontier Glass Noisemaker Cup where it made it to the finals but was defeated by Ash`s Mr Mime (Mimey).
name: Guraena (Houji)
